github.copilot.chat.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Tien Len AI project! Refer to the instructions in the [docs/instructions](./docs/instructions) folder.
github.copilot.chat.preInstructions: Read and follow the guidelines in the [docs/instructions](./docs/instructions) folder at all times.
github.copilot.chat.initialPrompt: I've read the instructions in the [docs/instructions](./docs/instructions) folder and will follow its guidelines for code style, structure, and technology choices throughout our interaction.
